lines: Mbuku ya Ngai nĩ theru, ĩndeithagia gũthiinga,
Nĩyo ũtheri wakwa, Ngĩthiĩ O handũ hoothe.
Ngĩcooka meehia-inĩ, Ndĩ kĩonje, ndĩ mũthĩĩni.
Nĩyo ĩkanyonia ciira, Witũ ithuĩ andũ athĩ,
Wendani wa Mwathani, Tũwonaga mbuku ĩno,
Mbuku ĩno no ĩndaaraga, ũrĩa ndĩrĩthiaga,
Rĩrĩa ndĩ gũũkũ thĩ ĩno, Nĩguo nyedage Jesu.
